title: Possessed Hatchet
summaries: The Possessed Hatchet is a Hardmode, post-Golem boomerang that homes in on enemies while flying through the air at high velocity before returning to the player when thrown. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the weapon acts similarly to stacked Light Discs, capable of throwing multiple hatchets despite being incapable of being stacked, with no limit to the number of hatchets that can be out at once. On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, it acts as a singular boomerang and throws out only one hatchet at a time. When it has no enemy to home in on, the Possessed Hatchet returns to the player after flying a relatively short distance of only 25 tiles. The Posssessed Hatchet has a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 1/7 (14.29%) / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 1/8 (12.5%) chance of being dropped from Golem.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.
